After a series of failed marriages, aspiring actress Amanda Hayes is ready to be back in the spotlight. Though her dreams of stardom are quickly squashed when she meets a man who forces her into the role of cold-blooded killer.

16.title: Christa Pike/Selena Hairston
16.plot: Troubled teen Christa Pike is ready to turn her life around, until she meets a man who takes her plans on a dark detour. And when he introduces her to a fiendish underworld, the lines between fantasy and reality become hell on earth. And in Richmond, Virginia...Growing up with a silver spoon in her mouth, Selena Hairston was taught that money is the key to happiness. But when she meets a man who's looking for a quick payday, she's forced to sever family ties in the most cold-hearted way imaginable.

17.title: T'Keisha Gilmer/Brandy Holmes

Feeling indebted, she willingly helps her lover in his new lucrative enterprise, only to wind up at the center of one of the most horrendous mass murders the area has ever seen. And Later, in Louisiana...Finding the perfect man to satisfy her dark desires seemed unlikely for Brandy Holmes. Until she bumped into her ideal male equivalent.
